&#3937;&#3926;: [2555] ... 1) pha'i zhe sa/ ... 2) skyibs/ ... bsil yab/ ... mda' yab/ ... 3) pho rgyud kyi lha/ ...
father, male personage in yidam groups

1) father [h]; 2) skyibs [shelter, air hole, round window [bsil [g]yab, cooling/ shading roof projection /mda' yab; cf nya yol awning]; 3) male tantric deity; 4) secret/ sexual centers of the father-consort GD; 5) yogi GD TSE
1) father. 2) masculine consort; secret father. father-consort. male deities
